short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes risk reminder popups, adds extra quality check photos button

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
• Removes anoying popups and fixes the non-functional checkbox on sites like CNFans, Mulebuy,  HooBuy

• Adds an extra button that allows you to see additional photos of the item

• You are notified every time extension takes actions (removes warm risk reminder popups)

• Contains an universal link converter, it means our extension converts any shipping agent link to another agent or reverts it to the original marketplace URL

* Our extension is not sponsored by third parties sites. But it contains affiliate programs, meaning we may receive commissions on qualifying purchases made through the provided links at no extra cost to you. This support helps us enhance our service continuously
